A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The Last Jedi is the first film of the new trilogy that feels as though it isn't entirely relying of the previous films. It doesn't have a horrible lack of character like Rogue One\, and it doesn't replay a previous film beat for beat like The Force Awakens. Instead\, it finally feels like a new Star Wars movie. It's engaging\, fun\, and fresh\, all the things necessary to prove that the new trilogy is just that; a new trilogy.
